blogPost.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
blogPost.body: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
blogPost.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples
blogPost.author: Charles Hudson

localize.description: Zeta联名卡是为现代夫妇设计的。夫妻双方可获得一个联名账户和两张借记卡，让双方都能掌握共同的财务状况，包括共同支付账单和储蓄。我们的目标是让共同的银行业务变得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 现代夫妇的共同银行业务

localize.description: Zeta聯名卡是爲現代夫婦設計的。夫妻雙方可獲得一個聯名賬戶和兩張借記卡，讓雙方都能掌握共同的財務狀況，包括共同支付賬單和儲蓄。我們的目標是讓共同的銀行業務變得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 現代夫婦的共同銀行業務

previous.title: Can’t wait to see this place when junk bonds yields go negative.

localize.full_text: 等不到垃圾债券收益率为负的时候，就可以看到这里了。
等不到垃圾債券收益率爲負的時候，就可以看到這裏了。
